title: Club Q Admin has same functionality as Author
Club Q Admin - first-level approval
custom_preconds: GIVEN that user is a Club Questionnaire Admin
custom_expected: THEN user has the right of first-level approval for all questionnaires created within their Club.

title: Club Q Admin - request Central Office approval
custom_preconds: GIVEN that Admin has approved a questionnaire
custom_expected: THEN Admin can request Central Office to review the questionnaire.

title: Author has same functionality as Scout
Author cannot use tablet
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that Author is drafting a questionnaire
AND Author is using a tablet
custom_steps: WHEN Author taps questionnaire
custom_expected:
THEN a popup appears that reads: 
We've detected that you're using a device which supports touch interaction. Touch interaction is not supported on the Questionnaire creation tool.
AND the popup appears over the questionnaire dropdown
AND questionnaire functions are disabled.

title: Author requests Admin approval
custom_preconds: GIVEN that Author has completed a questionnaire
custom_expected: THEN Author can request their Club Questionnaire Admin to review the questionnaire.

title: Author sees Central Office review
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that Club has submitted a questionnaire for Central Office to review
AND Central Office has completed its review
custom_expected: THEN Author can see the Central Office's review of the questionnaire.

title: Author replies to Central Office review
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that Club has submitted a questionnaire for Central Office to review
AND Central Office has completed its review
custom_steps: WHEN Author sees Central Office's review
custom_expected: THEN Author can comment on the review.

title: Review is BOC-Club only, not within Club
custom_preconds: GIVEN that Author has created a questionnaire
custom_expected:
THEN the Author's Club Questionnaire Admin can review the questionnaire
AND Central Office can review the questionnaire
AND no other member of the Author's Club can review the questionnaire.

title: Author sees index screen of questionnaires
Author chooses type of questionnaire
custom_preconds: GIVEN that user is a Club Questionnaire Author
custom_steps: WHEN author creates a questionnaire
custom_expected:
THEN author can choose the type of questionnaire
AND one choice is Common Application Questionnaire
AND one choice is Medical Questionnaire
[AND one choice is Club-Specific?]

title: Author chooses school level for questionnaire
custom_preconds: GIVEN that user is a Club Questionnaire Author
custom_steps: WHEN author creates a questionnaire
custom_expected:
THEN author chooses the school level
AND one choice is high school
AND one choice is college
AND one choice is both.

title: Author chooses among questionnaires
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that Author is on the home page
AND nav has appeared
custom_steps: WHEN Author clicks on Questionnaires in the nav
custom_expected:
THEN dropdown appears
AND dropdown is limited to 6 items 
AND items in the dropdown are:
Create New Questionnaire
Review AAA Questionnaires (x)
[where AAA = Club's 3-letter abbreviation]
[where x = number of Club's questionnaires]
Current Year Common Questionnaire
Current Year Medical Questionnaire
Previous Year Common Questionnaire
Previous Year Medical Questionnaire

AND list does not include Club-Specific questionnaires.

title: Author copies a questionnaire
custom_preconds: GIVEN that Author is copying a questionnaire
custom_expected: THEN Author can only copy a questionnaire generated within Author's own Club.

title: Copy questionnaire toggle
custom_preconds: GIVEN that Author is copying a questionnaire
custom_expected:
THEN the Copy toggle appears
AND the toggle shows 2 years of questionnaires by default
AND toggle is configurable to show more.

title: Current questionnaire is unlocked
custom_preconds: GIVEN that Author has selected the Questionnaires option in the nav
custom_steps: WHEN the current year's questionnaire is unlocked
custom_expected: THEN that item is grayed out in the dropdown list.

title: Author changes status of questionnaire to Draft
custom_preconds: GIVEN that Author is creating a questionnaire
custom_steps: WHEN Author moves the questionnaire into Draft status
custom_expected:
THEN DP system records the date and time questionnaire was moved into Draft status
AND system tracks all the edits made after that date and time
AND system displays edits made since 2 previous status changes.

title: Q status change triggers email
custom_preconds: GIVEN that Author is creating a questionnaire
custom_steps: WHEN Author changes the status of the questionnaire
custom_expected: THEN an email about the change is sent to relevant users.

title: Author sees info for available statuses
custom_preconds: GIVEN that Author is creating a questionnaire
custom_steps: WHEN Author changes the status of the questionnaire
custom_expected: THEN the correct buttons and labels for all available statuses are displayed.

title: Delete page warning
custom_preconds: GIVEN that Author is creating a questionnaire page
custom_steps: WHEN Author chooses to delete the page
custom_expected:
THEN a popup appears that reads: You are about to delete this page and any questions associated with it.
AND popup gives the option to continue deletion
AND popup gives the option to cancel deletion.

title: Columns exceed page width
custom_preconds: GIVEN that Author is creating a questionnaire
custom_steps: WHEN the number of columns on a page exceeds the page width
custom_expected:
THEN a horizontal scroll bar appears
AND the scroll bar is functional.

title: Question Type has instructions
custom_preconds: GIVEN Author is creating a questionnaire
custom_expected:
THEN underneath Question Type is a message:
Click [on] any icon to add it to your questionnaire.

AND message is horizontally centered beneath Question Type.

title: Author chooses question type
custom_preconds: GIVEN that Author is creating a questionnaire
custom_steps: WHEN Author clicks on Question Type
custom_expected: THEN popup appears with icons and labels indicating all the possible question types.

title: No limit to number of questions
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that Author is creating a questionnaire
AND the questionnaire is not a Club-Specific questionnaire
custom_expected: THEN Author can add an unlimited number of questions to the questionnaire.

title: Club-Specific Questionnaire: limit is 20 questions
custom_preconds: GIVEN that Author is creating a Club-Specific questionnaire
custom_expected: THEN questionnaire is limited to 20 questions.

title: Questions are numbered
custom_preconds: GIVEN that Author is creating a questionnaire
custom_expected:
THEN created questions are automatically numbered
AND numbering automatically adjusts when questions are moved around.

title: Author copies a question
custom_preconds: GIVEN that Author is creating a questionnaire
custom_steps: WHEN Author copies a question
custom_expected: THEN the copied question appears just below the original question.

title: Author adds questions to different pages
Author adds conditional question
custom_preconds: GIVEN that Author is creating a questionnaire
custom_steps: WHEN Author adds a conditional question
custom_expected:
THEN answering its parent question produces the conditional question
AND the conditional question is lettered instead of numbered.

title: Author adds an "Other" option to a question
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that Author is creating a questionnaire
AND Author is creating a multiple-choice question
custom_steps: WHEN Author chooses "Other" as one option of the multiple-choice
custom_expected: THEN selecting Other will open a conditional question.

title: Author creates single-answer question
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that Author is creating a questionnaire
AND Author is creating a single-answer question
custom_expected: THEN question is formed with radio buttons.

title: Author creates date question
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that Author is creating a questionnaire
AND Author is creating a date question
custom_expected: THEN answer is formatted as...

title: Author creates yes/no question
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that Author is creating a questionnaire
AND Author is creating a yes/no question

title: Author creates multiple-choice question
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that Author is creating a questionnaire
AND Author is creating a multiple-choice question
custom_expected: THEN question is formed with checkboxes.

title: Author creates text box question
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that Author is creating a questionnaire
AND Author is creating a text box question

title: Author creates stepper question
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that Author is creating a questionnaire
AND Author is creating a stepper question
custom_expected:
THEN question has a minus sign to the left of the answer
AND question has a plus sign to the right of the answer
AND answer is an integer
AND Author defines minimum value for answer
AND Author defines maximum value for answer.

title: Author creates percent question
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that Author is creating a questionnaire
AND Author is creating a percent question
custom_expected:
THEN answer must be between zero and 100
AND answer can go up to 3 digits after decimal point.

title: Author creates number question
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that Author is creating a questionnaire
AND Author is creating a number question
custom_expected: THEN answer can go up to 3 digits after the decimal point.

title: Author creates slider question
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that Author is creating a questionnaire
AND Author is creating a slider question
custom_expected:
THEN answer is an integer
AND Author defines minimum value
AND Author defines maximum value.

title: Author creates drag and drop ranking question
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that Author is creating a questionnaire
AND Author is creating a drag and drop ranking question

title: Author creates single-answer grid
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that Author is creating a questionnaire
AND Author is creating a single-answer grid question
custom_expected: THEN only one answer is accepted per row.

title: Author creates multiple-answer grid
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that Author is creating a questionnaire
AND Author is creating a multiple-answer grid question

title: Author creates follow-up question
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that Author is creating a questionnaire
AND Author is creating a follow-up question
custom_expected:
THEN parent question is a single-answer question
OR parent question is a yes/no question
OR parent question is a multiple-choice question
AND parent question cannot be any other type of question.

title: Author moves follow-up question
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that Author is creating a questionnaire
AND Author is adding multiple follow-up questions to one question
custom_steps: WHEN Author drags and drops a follow-up question to a different location in the list of follow-up questions
custom_expected: THEN the follow-up questions re-order as intended.

title: Header - appearance
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that Scout is on the Draft Prospects website
AND header has appeared
custom_expected:
THEN header has 2 elements: Draft Prospects logo, nav
AND the nav has 5 options: Prospects, Surveys, Messages, Support, User Name
AND the Surveys and User Name options have down-facing carats
AND User Name is formatted: F. Last
AND a dark blue rule appears above the nav option that is the current page.

title: Header nav - hover
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that Scout is on the Draft Prospects site
AND header nav has appeared
AND the blue rule has appeared above the nav option that is the current page
custom_steps: WHEN user hovers cursor over another option in the nav
custom_expected: THEN a second blue rule appears over that option.

title: Header nav - hover over dropdown
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that Scout is on the Draft Prospects site
AND header nav has appeared
custom_steps: WHEN Scout hovers cursor over a nav option with a down-facing carat
custom_expected: THEN that option's dropdown menu appears.

title: Club cannot see another Club's invited prospects
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that user is a member of a Club
AND user is on the Prospects page
custom_expected: THEN user cannot see any prospects that were invited by another Club.

title: Club can see Central Office invited prospects
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that user is a member of a Club
AND user is on the Prospects page
custom_expected: THEN user can see all prospects who were invited by the BOC Central Office.

title: Prospects Page - Header - appearance
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that Scout is on the Draft Prospects website
AND header has appeared
custom_expected:
THEN 2 elements have been added to the header: search box, new invite button
AND inside the search box is a magnifying glass icon and the prompt: Search Roster Name
AND the new invite button is a white + icon on a dark blue circle

title: Prospects page - search function
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that Scout is on the Prospects page
AND Scout has clicked or tapped inside the Search field
custom_steps:
WHEN Scout starts typing in the Search field
AND Scout types at least 2 letters
custom_expected:
THEN Prospects chart produces results
AND the results include only names that have the typed sequence of letters
AND a close X link appears inside the Search field at the far right of the field.

title: Prospects page - search produces no results
Prospects page - cancel search
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that Scout has searched for a Prospect
AND X close link has appeared inside the Search field
custom_steps: WHEN Scout clicks or taps on the X close link inside the Search field
custom_expected:
THEN typed characters disappear from the Search field
AND the chart changes to show all Prospects.

title: Prospects page - filters
custom_preconds: GIVEN that Scout is on the Prospects page
custom_expected:
THEN below the Draft Prospects logo is a row of filter buttons
AND the filter buttons are labeled: Draft Year, Invitations, Survey Response, Location, Position, More Filters.

title: Prospects page - pagination
custom_preconds: GIVEN that Scout is on the Prospects page
custom_expected:
THEN below the header nav are 3 pagination elements: pages, carat, Prospect count
AND the element on the left is 1, 2, 3, ellipses, x
AND x is the total number of pages
AND the numbers and ellipses are dark blue
AND the number of the current page is white with a dark blue circle behind it
AND next to x is a right-facing carat
AND the carat is circled with a dark blue border
AND centered below the pagination and carat is the Prospect count
AND the count is formatted: 1 - y of z+ Prospects
AND y is the total of Prospects visible on this screen
AND z is the total Prospects rounded to the nearest hundred.

title: Prospects page - chart column headers
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that Scout is on the Prospects page
AND Prospects chart has appeared
custom_expected:
THEN the chart column headers are: 
Roster Name
Sort A-Z
School Name
School State
Invite Date
Sign Up Date
Invited By
Unfinished Item(s)
Action dropdown
Select All checkbox

title: Prospects page - BOC invited prospects appear
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that Scout is on the Club's Prospects page
AND Prospects chart has appeared
custom_steps: WHEN the Scouting Bureau has invited a Prospect to sign up on DP
custom_expected:
THEN that Prospect appears in the Prospects chart whether or not he has signed up yet
AND the Invited By column for that Prospect displays "Scouting Bureau."

title: Prospects page - chart centering
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that Scout is on the Prospects page
AND Prospects chart has appeared
custom_expected:
THEN all entries under Name are left-aligned
AND all other entries are horizontally centered in their columns.

title: Prospects page - linked names
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that Scout is on the Prospects page
AND Prospects chart has appeared
custom_expected:
THEN the name of any Prospect who has signed up to DP is blue and underlined
AND the name is linked to the Prospect's individual page.

title: Prospects page - Sign Up Date warning icon
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that Scout is on the Prospects page
AND Prospects chart has appeared
custom_steps: WHEN a Prospect's first invite is over 30 days old
custom_expected:
THEN a warning icon appears in the Prospect's Sign Up Date field
AND the warning icon is a red exclamation point inside a red-bordered triangle.

title: Prospects page - restricted view
custom_preconds: GIVEN Scout is on Prospects page
custom_expected:
THEN Scout can see Prospects invited by own Club
AND Scout can see Prospects invited by Central Office
AND Scout cannot see Prospects invited by other Clubs.

title: Prospects page - sort by name
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that Scout is on the Prospects page
AND Prospects chart has appeared
custom_steps: WHEN Scout sorts by name
custom_expected: THEN the Prospects are sorted by their last names.

title: Scout can download
custom_preconds: When a download option exists, it works.

title: Scout can view all relevant screens
Scout views a report of multiple questionnaires
Scout downloads report as raw data
QUESTION: Scout downloads report in .pdf form?
custom_expected: .pdf form could look like a paper survey?
